Body:
import ssl
with _http_server() as server_data:
    server_data.server.socket = ssl.wrap_socket(server_data.server.socket,
        certfile=p('tests', 'cert.pem'), keyfile=p('tests', 'key.pem'),
        server_side=True)
    server_data.start()
    server_data.ssl_context = ssl.SSLContext()
    server_data.ssl_context.load_verify_locations(p('tests', 'cert.pem'))
    server_data.scheme = 'https'
    yield server_data
fixture
